definitions.definition: the flavour of something, or the ability of a person or animal to recognize different flavours:
examples: I love the taste of garlic.

definitions.definition: the fact of liking or enjoying something:
examples: She came home from Europe with a taste for art and the finer things in life.
Have a taste of the sauce and tell me if it needs salt.

definitions.definition: to put food or drink in your mouth to find out what flavour it has:
examples: Taste this sauce and tell me if it needs seasoning.
